mapper.sql: worker_id, person_id, daily_pay, data_status, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, remark
mapper.select:
SELECT mw.*, mp.person_name, mp.phone_num, mp.id_num, mp.sex, mp.alias, mp.address, mwa.last_attendance_date FROM m_worker mw LEFT JOIN m_person mp ON mw.person_id = mp.person_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT worker_id, MAX(date) AS last_attendance_date FROM t_worker_attendance GROUP BY worker_id) mwa ON mw.worker_id = mwa.worker_id WHERE mw.data_status = 1
AND ( mp.person_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{personName}, '%') OR mp.alias LIKE CONCAT('%', #{personName}, '%') )
AND mp.phone_num LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phoneNum}, '%')
AND mp.id_num LIKE CONCAT('%', #{idNum}, '%')
ORDER BY SUBSTRING(mwa.last_attendance_date, 7) DESC, mw.create_time DESC
